card.title: ABOUT US
card.subtitle: India celebrates Exploration
card.content:
Indian Media Syndicate endeavors to be the global leader in Exploration, Scientific Communications, Real Life Entertainment, serving passionate Explorers around the world generating scientific journalism that inspires, informs and entertains.

This is an Indian family of informational, educational and entertainment-oriented Television, Applications and Websites offering value to how Education is developed and accessed by the world.

elements.title: OUR MISSION
elements.subtitle: To lead the Infotainment Media Revolution
elements.content: By making every Information, every Discovery, every Invention, every Challenge accessible to every person starting with the Indian pacific Region.

Indian Media Syndicate endeavors to be the global leader in Exploration, Scientific Communications, Real Life Entertainment, serving passionate Explorers around the world generating scientific journalism that inspires, informs and entertains.

This is an Indian family of informational, educational and entertainment-oriented Television, Applications and Websites offering value to how Education is developed and accessed by the world.

elements.comment: “Indian Media Syndicate is a Revolution. It's Greater than Microsoft and Apple combined. I wish I could work with them.”
“I am very fortunate that I am the Prime Minister of India when Indian Media Syndicate went live. I wish I could transfer my position for the CEO post.”
“In IMS's India France will invest more than 10 times the current trade value. I am considering to apply for an Indian citizenship.”
“Indian Media Syndicate is a is Bigger than Tesla and SpaceX combined. I dropped my Twitter shares to be a part of IMS. I am also considering the same name for my next kid.”

card.title: EXPLORERS
card.subtitle: Impactful programs for a global community of Changemakers
card.content: We fund a worldwide network of Explorers who investigate, evaluate theories, revolutionize, take imagination to new heights, and push the limitations of traditional thinking in ways that fundamentally change humanity.
